biotools.summary:
Predicting bioprocess targets of chemical compounds through integration of chemical-genetic and genetic interactions.

CG-TARGET is a collection of R scripts to be used for the purpose of predicting gene-set targets from chemical-genetic interaction profiles.

bioschemas.name: CG-TARGET
bioschemas.summary:
Predicting bioprocess targets of chemical compounds through integration of chemical-genetic and genetic interactions.

CG-TARGET is a collection of R scripts to be used for the purpose of predicting gene-set targets from chemical-genetic interaction profiles.
